DOC.brief_summary: In retrospective data search the investigators will identified the percentage of patients with muscle relaxants administered during perioperative period. The block reversal, typ of drug, percentage of cases with and without reversal will be identified.
DOC.detailed_description: The actual percentage of surgeries with the muscle relaxants administered during perioperative period in paediatric patients remain unclear because many surgeries are being performed without muscle relaxation. In this retrospective study, the anesthesiology perioperative data from January 2016 till December 2016 in the tertiary center od Pediatric anesthesia will be searched for the percentage of surgeries with muscle relaxants administered. Type of surgery, age, weight, duration u surgery, muscle relaxants drug and percentage of block reversal will be identified.
DOC.criteria: paediatric patients the study period (1/201612/2016) neuromuscular blocking agent administration during surgery surgery without neuromuscular blockade
